dcterms:description: The AVSD dataset contains 10-turn dialogues, each grounded on one video, designed for evaluating video-grounded dialogue systems.
dcterms:title: Audio-Visual Scene-Aware Dialogues (AVSD)

dcterms:description: The Charades dataset is a large-scale dataset for activity understanding, containing videos of people performing various activities in home settings.
dcterms:title: Charades

dcterms:description: The DSTC7 dataset is used for the Dialogue System Technology Challenge 7, focusing on generating responses in dialogue systems.
dcterms:title: Dialogue System Technology Challenge 7 (DSTC7)
